branding.tagline: This Block provides a comprehensive overview of all order, customer, and product data for your Shopify store. It can be used to set up alerts for quarterly reports or KPI tracking.

AUDIT_LOG_EXPORT_TABLE_NAME.label: Audit Log Export Table Name
AUDIT_LOG_EXPORT_TABLE_NAME.description: The table name of your BQ Optimization data (typically cloudaudit_googleapis_com_data_access_*).
